code: import React from'react';import'./about.css';import Profile from'./Profile';import Information from'./Information';import CV from'../../assets/nelson-mateus.pdf';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const About=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/ /* about-section */_jsxs("section",{className:"about section",id:"about",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"section__title",children:"About me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section__subtitle",children:"My introduction"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__container container grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__data",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Information,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"about__description",children:["I am a Systems Analyst and Meteorologist with a passion for data science and full stack development.",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"With a solid background in meteorology and systems analysis, I approach complex problems in a multidisciplinary way.",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"My experience as a data scientist enables me to transform information into actionable insights, while my full stack development skills allow me to create complete and effective technological solutions.",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"I am committed to applying my experience to deliver innovation and solutions that meet real-world needs."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{download:" ",href:CV,className:"download__cv",children:["Download CV",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-download download__cv-icon"})]})]})]})]});};export default About;
